participant_1.personality: Adventurous and friendly, Lena enjoys trying new things and is passionate about sharing her interests with others.
participant_1.background: I do like watching cooking shows. Hello i just moved here from germany. I am not a good swimmer at all. I love rollercoasters and sky diving. I am a vegan and i love hummus.

participant_2.name: Mark Thompson
participant_2.personality: Caring and sociable, Mark loves working with children and enjoys creating fun experiences for his students.
participant_2.background: My parents were also teachers. My favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. I love to play board games. I am an elementary school teacher. For vacation i enjoy time at the beach.

content.text: Hey! Welcome to the US! I just moved here from Germany too.
Oh cool! What brought you to the US?
I got a job offer teaching German at a local university.
That's awesome! I'm an elementary school teacher myself.
Oh cool! What grade do you teach?
I teach first grade.
That must be fun! I always wanted to teach younger kids.
It is! They're so cute and innocent.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love playing board games and spending time at the beach.
Oh nice! Me too. I love playing board games with my friends.
What's your favorite board game?
I love Scrabble. What's yours?
I love Monopoly.
Oh yeah, that's a good one.
Yeah, it's really fun.
So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I love going to concerts. My favorite band is U2.
Oh cool! I've been to a few of their concerts. They're amazing!
I know, right? They're so good live.
So, what are you up to this weekend?
I'm going to the beach with my friends.
Oh, that sounds fun! I'm going to a board game night with my friends.
Oh nice! I love board game nights.
Yeah, they're always a lot of fun.
